name: ZombieRush (itch)
description:
Zombie Rush it a survival shooter game created for one of our university project for our programming module, so the game entirely created by myself using free assets from external supplier. 

This 2D game has a duration of around 5 minutes of game-play depending how skilled you're, You will be controlling  the body of a soldier and your mission is to annihilate the zombie that will spawn around you. 

Implementation:

Dynamic spawn system: Using five different spawn point that will alternate each zombie and location where they spawning.

Difficulty increase: The game will also increase their running speed and damage from the zombie's in each level.

Simple loot system: when killing these zombie they have a chance to drop loot based on a percentage

: Recover your life back to 100%

: Add 50 points to your score.

: Change your weapon to a shotgun for the next 10 seconds.

Feel free to drop a comment,

Hope you enjoy!
